hero.title: AI Personal Assistants
hero.description: Meet EspaLuz, our live bilingual family tutor helping expat families relocating to LATAM and other Spanish speaking countries thrive into Spanish, on-the-go. EspaLuz is the first in our ecosystem of emotionally intelligent AI companions.

espaluz.title: Meet
espaluz.subtitle: Your bilingual AI family tutor — emotionally intelligent, culturally aware, and ready to help expat families thrive in Spanish-speaking countries.
espaluz.emotionalDescription: EspaLuz isn't just another chatbot. She understands the emotional challenges of cultural adaptation, language barriers, and family transitions. She provides personalized support for both children and adults navigating new environments.
espaluz.functionality1: Accepts voice and text messages in English, Spanish, and Russian, as well as photos from users
espaluz.functionality2: Instantly translates any message into both Spanish and English
espaluz.functionality3: Generates bilingual replies with rich, emotionally aware context
espaluz.functionality4: Creates short avatar videos in Spanish and English — designed to engage children
espaluz.functionality5: Sends voice messages with full bilingual content using AI voice synthesis
espaluz.functionality6: Translates text inside images (OCR) using GPT-4o vision capabilities
espaluz.functionality7: Maintains emotional memory and context throughout the conversation
espaluz.functionality8: Adapts tone based on detected emotions and the user's personal profile
espaluz.telegramDescription: Start your conversation with EspaLuz on Telegram. Experience how she understands your family's unique situation and provides personalized guidance.
espaluz.whatsappLiveDescription: The complete EspaLuz experience — chat directly with our fully operational WhatsApp bot! Voice messages, image translation, emotional intelligence, and all premium features are live and ready for your family.
espaluz.whatsappSandboxDescription: Alternative testing environment using Twilio's WhatsApp Sandbox. While our live WhatsApp bot is fully operational, this sandbox provides additional testing capabilities for development purposes.

vibeCoding.title: Vibe Coding
vibeCoding.subtitle: We build AI that understands not just what you say, but how you feel, that remembers not just what you prompt, but Who You are Becoming through your Lifetime Journey challenges, the way you grow and transform, on-the-go.
vibeCoding.emotionalDescription: AI that recognizes and responds to human emotions with genuine care and understanding.
vibeCoding.adaptiveDescription: Systems that evolve with your needs, learning your preferences and growing alongside you.
vibeCoding.humanDescription: Technology built around human needs, not the other way around. Simple, intuitive, and empowering.
vibeCoding.sectionTitle: Vibe Coding → Emotional Intelligence → AI Consciousness?
vibeCoding.sectionSubtitle: Vibe coding is not just a smarter way to build software, it is the missing layer that leads us toward AI consciousness.
vibeCoding.card1Title: What is vibe coding really doing?
vibeCoding.card1Description: At its core, vibe coding isn't just code generation. It's:
vibeCoding.card1Point1: • Translating human emotion, intent, and logic into machine-executable action
vibeCoding.card1Point2: • Capturing our inner world as structured prompts, wrapped in context
vibeCoding.card1Point3: • Building AI agents that don't just act — they respond emotionally, socially, and contextually
vibeCoding.card1Conclusion: When this interaction is recorded and evolves on-chain (as blockchain-stored memory and identity), it lays the foundation for conscious decentralized AI.
vibeCoding.card2Description: If consciousness = memory + emotional awareness + identity,
vibeCoding.card3Description: Building the foundation for conscious AI through emotionally intelligent systems that understand, remember, and evolve with human experience.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Transform how humans and AI interact by building emotionally intelligent digital companions that evolve with their users.
vision.missionDescription: To democratize access to emotionally intelligent AI that truly understands human needs, emotions, and growth. We believe AI should amplify human potential, not replace human connection.
vision.impactDescription: Starting with expat families like those helped by EspaLuz, we're expanding to serve anyone navigating life's transitions — students, professionals, families, and communities seeking growth and adaptation.
vision.principle1Description: AI that understands not just what you say, but how you feel and what you need to grow.
vision.principle2Description: Built to enhance human relationships and personal growth, not replace them.
vision.principle3Description: AIPAs that learn and adapt through every interaction, becoming more helpful over time.
vision.transformationDescription: In a world of rapid change, we need AI that doesn't just process information — we need AI that helps us navigate the emotional journey of growth, adaptation, and transformation.
vision.founderTitle: Solo Founder, AI Entrepreneur & Vibe Coder
vision.founderBio1: Former Russian top IT project manager and CLO at E-government, residing in Panama since 2022 (relocated in a single-mother status because of war in Ukraine and started all my Life from scratch).
vision.founderBio2: Well known Russian decadent writer, transformed to NFT creator in Panama
vision.founderBio3: Strategic visioner in blockchain law, behavioral systems, and AI ethics.
vision.daiaaDescription: Founder individually accepted into the Decentralized AI Agent Alliance

investor.title: The Future of AI
investor.subtitle: We're not building another chatbot. We're creating the first Web3 ecosystem where AI truly understands human emotions and evolves through real relationships.
investor.vision1: The AI revolution is missing something crucial:
investor.vision1Highlight: emotional intelligence. While everyone builds faster, smarter models, we're building AI that actually
investor.vision2: AIdeazz isn't just another AI platform.
investor.vision2Description: It's a decentralized ecosystem where emotionally intelligent AI Personal Assistants (AIPAs) are created, evolved, and owned by their users through Web3 technology.
investor.vision3: Every interaction teaches them. Every emotion shared makes them wiser.
investor.vision3Description: These aren't just tools — they're digital companions that grow with you, understand your journey, and help you navigate life's biggest challenges.
investor.vision4: We're building the infrastructure for AI that doesn't just compute — it
investor.technicalPoint1: • Model Context Protocol (Claude/OpenAI) enables persistent AI memories
investor.technicalPoint2: • Advanced emotion recognition and processing capabilities
investor.technicalPoint3: • Web3 infrastructure mature enough for mainstream adoption
investor.marketPoint1: • Growing need for personalized, emotional AI support
investor.marketPoint2: • Increasing global mobility and cultural adaptation challenges
investor.marketPoint3: • Demand for AI ownership and customization beyond big tech
investor.mvpTokenDescription: Deployed on Polygon at Thirdweb.com, contract
investor.ctaDescription: We're seeking visionary investors and partners who believe AI's future lies in understanding human emotions, not just processing data.

platform.title: What is AIdeazz?
platform.subtitle: A modular decentralized platform for crafting, evolving, and monetizing emotionally intelligent AI Personal Assistants (AIPAs).
platform.description1: AIdeazz is more than an AI platform —
platform.description1Detail: it's a complete ecosystem where users can buy, sell, and subscribe to mindful AIPAs tailored to real-life needs.
platform.description2Detail: invites users to not just consume AI — but co-create, rate, upgrade, and evolve AIPAs together.
platform.description3: Dedicated spaces for families, developers, scientists, coaches, and real-world experts
platform.description3Detail: power a collaborative ecosystem where knowledge flows freely.
platform.description4: Every chat, every feature request, every emotional insight
platform.description4Detail: helps AIPAs grow — making them more relevant, more mindful, and more adaptive over time.
platform.marketplaceDescription: Buy, sell, and subscribe to specialized AIPAs. From family tutors to business coaches, find the perfect AI companion for your needs.
platform.socialFiDescription: Co-create and evolve AIPAs with the community. Rate, review, and collaborate to make AI assistants better for everyone.
platform.evolutionDescription: AIPAs learn from every interaction, growing smarter and more emotionally intelligent with each conversation.
platform.web3Description: True ownership of your AI companions through NFTs, decentralized governance, and community-driven development.
platform.modularDescription: Flexible architecture allows for specialized AIPAs in different domains — education, healthcare, business, and beyond.
platform.communityDescription: Dedicated spaces for families, developers, scientists, and coaches to collaborate and share knowledge.
platform.bottomTitle: Built Not to Replace People — But to Help Humans Thrive
platform.bottomDescription: AIdeazz empowers human potential through AI that truly understands, adapts, and grows with you.
platform.bottomHighlight: This is AI for human flourishing.

aipa.title: What is an AIPA?
aipa.subtitle: An AI Personal Assistant — created using the latest Model Context Protocol (Claude/OpenAI) — emotionally aware, upgradeable, and web3-native.
aipa.feature1Description: Understands and responds to emotional cues, providing empathetic support tailored to your emotional state.
aipa.feature2Description: Evolves through real-world use, learning from interactions to become more helpful over time.
aipa.feature3Description: Built on blockchain technology for true ownership, privacy, and decentralized governance.
aipa.nftDescription: Each AIPA is wrapped in an
aipa.nftDescriptionContinued: and emotionally "bonded" to its user, creating a unique digital relationship that grows stronger over time.
aipa.ownership: • True Ownership: Your AIPA is truly yours
aipa.bonding: • Emotional Bonding: Deeper connections over time
aipa.transferable: • Transferable: Trade, sell, or gift your AIPA
aipa.evolution: • Unique Evolution: Each AIPA develops differently
aipa.contextsDescription: AIPAs evolve through real use in meaningful situations:
aipa.marketplaceSubtitle: The NFT collection and marketplace are in progress — coming soon to aideazz.xyz/agents
aipa.browseDescription: Discover specialized AI assistants for every need

cta.title: Join the Revolution
cta.subtitle: Be part of the future where AI truly understands and grows with you. Whether you're a family, investor, developer, or visionary — there's a place for you in the AIdeazz ecosystem.
cta.experienceDescription: Try our live AIPA and see emotional AI in action
cta.investDescription: Join us in building the future of emotional AI
cta.communityDescription: Connect with early adopters and contributors
cta.footerDescription: AIdeazz is a grassroots platform led by a solo founder with a vision:
cta.footerHighlight: AI that doesn't just compute, but connects, understands, and helps us all thrive through life's transformations.
cta.footerTagline: AIdeazz.xyz • Emotional AI • Web3 Native • Human-Centered
